snippet: Brazil's state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA and some of its executives were hit with a U.S. class action lawsuit by investors in $98 billion of the company's securities over an alleged kickback and bribery scheme....

headline.print_headline: Petrobras Hit With U.S. Class Action Suit Over $98 Billion in Securities
headline.main: Petrobras Hit With U.S. Class Action Suit Over $98 Billion in Securities

lead_paragraph: Brazil's state-run oil company Petroleo Brasileiro SA and some of its executives were hit with a U.S. class action lawsuit by investors in $98 billion of the company's securities over an alleged kickback and bribery scheme.
